meanings: bombard sth from the sea[from a warship, by sea]
bombardment from a warship[by naval guns], naval bombardment

examples.korean: On that day, North Korean ships crossed the NLL again and fired. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그날, 북한 배들은 다시 NLL을 넘었고 그들은 함포사격을 하였다. EDU TIMES

examples.korean: The Choi Young’s 5-inch gun fired shells at the ship to distract the pirates’ attention. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 해적들의 시선을 흐트러뜨리기 위해 최영함의 5인치 함포가 불을 뿜었다. EDU TIMES
